name: Seedy Adventure
description:
Use arrow keys to move (Pc) The buttons to move(mobile)

Press the big button (mobile) or Space (PC) to attack.

You have to kill the enemies to go to the next floor.

At floor 10, there is a red gem that can be gotten if you defeat the enemies there. Then you’ll evolve to a sprout.

this is incomplete. I blame school. I was very busy. Sorry for the mediocre design.
